reviewText:
I bought it in 2014 and  watched it now again in 2018, not really brand new product (2007), but beside Rudy Maxas Blu Ray of Vancouver, Seattle anf SF (somewhat different and less comprehensive, but very well made) its from my standpoint the most informative and Comprehensive
DVD about Seattle, I didn't find anything better, great! The narrator is very sympathetic
My friend and I really enjoyed watching this and gave me ideas about which attractions I will visit when I go.
Good coverage of this great city

This is the 7th video in my collection.  Every time I think they can't get any better, they get better.  This introduction to Seattle was fabulously produced, written and narrated.  I have a concise "mental map" of Seattle, thanks to the video.  Being a father of two children, I am truly grateful for all of the "kid friendly" activities that were suggested in the video.  I am really looking forward to my next chance to make it out to Seattle with my family!
